jobDetails.jobTitle: Senior Software Engineer - AI Company (Fintech) - FULLY REMOTE (IN UK) - TypeScript Python AWS - 95,000
jobDetails.jobDescription:
I am exclusively representing an AI Driven Fintech Company with their search for a Senior Software Engineer.
They are going from strength to strength and have won another huge customer that they will be rolling out their product with.
They'll need a Senior Engineer who really has a deep understanding of Python, TypeScript, AWS and software engineering (& architecture) as a whole. You'll play an important role in tech decisions, shaping the direction of the product and project delivery.
They really need a self starter and a passionate Engineer - Someone who can hit the ground running and wants to be part of a lean (6) team within a start-up. There is tons of greenfield work to do and a big future ahead - Its a great time to join!
Skills:
React.jsTypeScriptPythonAWSPostgreSQLGenAI
Having a a senior understanding of ALL or MOST of the above is required. Any experience working for start-ups or in the AI + Fintech Space is a huge plus! Their second is a paired programming session that you'd need to showcase these skills.
They see this as a role for an ambitious Engineer to really hone their skills and grow within the team/ company.
It is really important that they find a generalist and someone who is really passionate about technology and engineering as a whole!
This role is FULLY REMOTE ANYWHERE IN THE UK & paying up to Â£95,000 for the right candidate
